com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.export
Class DeployTopologyExportService

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.export.DeployTopologyExportService

public class DeployTopologyExportService
extends java.lang.Object

This service is to be used when there is a need to provide an export option rather than reusing the existing export wizard, supplied with the platform. This class provides for the functions to invoke the export process with the desired exporter and set of options to create an output archive. It invokes the domain packagers to package the units associated with the workspace projects, to create an archive entry in the output zip.

Parameters:
anExporter - the exporter instance to be used

DeployTopologyExportService

public DeployTopologyExportService(TopologyExporter exporter,
                                   boolean exportWithErrors,
                                   boolean createLocationBinding,
                                   java.lang.String exportProjectName,
                                   boolean createExportProject,
                                   boolean exportDiagramResourceIfPresent,
                                   boolean exportModules)
Constructor for the service with the set of parameters than can be passed as input.

Parameters:
exporter - the exporter instance to be used
exportWithErrors - the option for exporting with errors by ignoring any exporter validation
createLocationBinding - option to create the location binding file for the file uri's
exportProjectName - the export output project name to be used when the option to create project is enabled
createExportProject - the option to create the export project
exportDiagramResourceIfPresent - the option to export the diagram resource if present
exportModules - the option to export the modules with-in the topology

DeployTopologyExportService

public DeployTopologyExportService(TopologyExporter exporter,
                                   boolean exportWithErrors,
                                   boolean createLocationBinding,
                                   java.lang.String exportProjectName,
                                   boolean createExportProject,
                                   boolean exportDiagramResourceIfPresent)
Constructor for the service with the set of parameters than can be passed as input. The option to export the modules is set to true.

Parameters:
exporter - the exporter instance to be used
exportWithErrors - the option for exporting with errors by ignoring any exporter validation
createLocationBinding - option to create the location binding file for the file uri's
exportProjectName - the export output project name to be used when the option to create project is enabled
createExportProject - the option to create the export project
exportDiagramResourceIfPresent - the option to export the diagram resource if present
Method Detail

exportDeploymentTopology

public void exportDeploymentTopology(Topology topology,
                                     java.lang.String zipFileName)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
This method exports the topology along with it;s packaged units to the passed zip. It creates a zip output stream and invokes the domain packagers as needed for workspace projects that are backing a unit in the topology.

Parameters:
topology - the topology to be exported
zipFileName - the name of the output zip file
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - an exception if export fails
